metadata.name: Hanging.
metadata.description:
I shot this photo of a kid I grew up with hanging from his window 6 stories high.

There were police below and the neighborhood was taped off.

He eventually let go.

A portion of the initial sale from this NFT will go to the HOPE Center in Harlem: 

https://hopecenterharlem.org

[3091 x 2048 px]
